comments:
[I20070501-0010]

Steps to reproduce:
1. Ctrl-3 to open the quick access dialog
2. type "tips"
3. select "Tips and Tricks"
4. select "Platform"

java.lang.NullPointerException

I can't seem to reproduce. Does it happen consistently? Was it the first time you opened help?
It was one of the first things I did with a new workspace.
I just tried this and I can reproduce the problem.
There was a race condition which caused a reference to a null thread.
